096d435b-9e96-49cb-a7da-4440907d3acf.name: Eight-hour energy reserve, Refuel 3 times per day

018f3381-402e-4814-8163-b1cd9ed9720a.name: Diffuse
018f3381-402e-4814-8163-b1cd9ed9720a.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

f5afc3dd-3d78-4ff6-98d5-c733ff1fc7cf.name: Homogenous
f5afc3dd-3d78-4ff6-98d5-c733ff1fc7cf.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

24e73644-b614-48e2-aa91-c54b3123a678.name: No Blood
24e73644-b614-48e2-aa91-c54b3123a678.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

2b984d2c-dbfb-42e0-93ef-d3632b237519.name: No Brain
2b984d2c-dbfb-42e0-93ef-d3632b237519.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

48e95100-c702-44d6-8ef2-b9e5909936d4.name: No Eyes
48e95100-c702-44d6-8ef2-b9e5909936d4.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

d6be358b-4487-4982-b77a-a883f1b0f42e.name: No Head
d6be358b-4487-4982-b77a-a883f1b0f42e.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

45404fbe-2d81-4aad-a91c-53fd9a3dd309.name: No Neck
45404fbe-2d81-4aad-a91c-53fd9a3dd309.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

44eac5d1-0ee4-4b20-a007-d6055020e316.name: No Vitals
44eac5d1-0ee4-4b20-a007-d6055020e316.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

4c03b5bf-6f5e-43dc-8a41-fec1a01e08fb.name: Unliving
4c03b5bf-6f5e-43dc-8a41-fec1a01e08fb.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

6472f4b5-bcbb-4616-b40d-463f2469eb5a.name: No fatigue points, Don't spend fatigue points

68bc7cbc-4499-4db6-a337-7986d2733919.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

8f529f15-b053-488f-adbd-056b27dd19f8.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

22d5260f-26e4-4d89-b5ad-80b2620634c2.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist
